[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22″ border_width_bottom=”5px” border_color_bottom=”#e02b20″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”About Us” module_class=”top-header-title-align” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ title_font_size=”48px” title_letter_spacing=”1px” background_color=”rgba(3,126,243,0)” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(0,0,0,0.3)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://thecyberforensics.com/wptcfadmn/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/01-cyber-forensics-image.jpg” custom_padding=”10%||10%||true|false” title_font_size_tablet=”42px” title_font_size_phone=”34px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” z_index_tablet=”500″][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_orientation=”justified” z_index_tablet=”500″]

Founded by a group of young IT professionals, Stellar Cyber Analytics Pvt. Ltd. aims to serve, investigate and provide first class solutions for data related crises. Our sole work lays on our expertise in recuperating or recovering “Lost Data”.

The team of Stellar Cyber Analytics is the best source to get evidence in case of any computer misuse and cyber attacks. We also do IT Audit, forensic analysis and Investigation, hard drive and digital media data recovery regardless of the physical condition of the device, design and other hardware issues. We are always discovering new advancements to make the client’s needs fully satisfied.

With advanced technology proven solutions, achievements rates and fair costing makes us at the priority list. We listen to your queries and gives you good practical advice for secure results. By hiring us, the clients get solutions as fast as possible.

To provide solutions of thousands of recovery projects, Stellar Cyber Analytics is considered as the number one in the market. We can recover the lost data of any government agencies, private businesses, corporations, medical centres, universities, armed forces and police departments.
